name: Nike Blazer Low 77 Vintage White Black

details.description:
The Nike Blazer Low 77 Vintage White Black returns with its low-profile style, and heritage basketball looks.

The nearly 1-to-1 remake of the Nike Blazer Low 77 Vintage White Black features crisp leather on the upper with soft suede and synthetic details for added durability and throwback styling. The ultra-clean colors, simple lines, and low-cut, padded collar continue the look, which is wrapped up by an outsole fused with the midsole. The solid rubber outsole with herringbone pattern adds traction, durability, and heritage styling.

The Nike Blazer Low 77 Vintage White Black was released in December 2020 and originally retailed for $85.

name: Nike Blazer Low 77 Jumbo White Black Sail

details.description:
The Nike Blazer Low 77 Jumbo White Black Sail provides wearers with extra support and cushioning, making them a convenient choice for either going about your daily business or embarking on a long walk throughout the city.

The Nike Blazer Low 77 Jumbo White Black Sail features a cream-colored sole, coupled with an extra-large version of the famous Nike swoosh symbol in black. On the toes and heels of the foot, you will find grey patches, as well as a splash of neon yellow beneath the laces.

First released in February of 2022, the Nike Blazer Low 77 Jumbo White Black Sail had a starting retail price of $95.

name: Nike Blazer Low Devin Booker Chevrolet Team Dark Green
Nike Blazer Low sacai Iron Grey

details.description:
The Nike Blazer Low sacai Iron Grey displays design themes that are prevalent in Nike and Sacai's collaborative history together. An Iron Grey and white leather upper provides a neutral look, allowing its layered construction to rise to prominence. From there, doubled Swooshes, tongues, and eyestays add a reconstructed feel to the classic design.

The Nike Blazer Low sacai Iron Grey released in July of 2021 and retailed for $120.

name: Nike Blazer Low Off-White University Red

details.description:
The Nike Blazer Low Off-White White University Red boasts a multi-disciplinary, multi-sport aesthetic - a central motif in Virgil Abloh's body of work. Encompassing aspects of basketball, skateboarding, and trail running silhouettes, the Off-White Blazer Low fuses an Air Terra Humara TPU heel piece with a classic vulcanized sole for a unique base. On the white leather upper, punched-out holes are scattered, similar to the Air Jordan 5 Off-White. An accented over-lacing system, exposed foam tongue, zip tie tag, and Swoosh tab all add Off-White's signature detailing to this modified classic.

The Nike Blazer Low Off-White White University Red released in April of 2022 and retailed for $140.

name: Nike Blazer Low Off-White Black Electro Green

details.description:
The Nike Blazer Low Off-White Black Electro Green boasts a multi-disciplinary, multi-sport aesthetic - a central motif in Virgil Abloh's body of work. Encompassing aspects of basketball, skateboarding, and trail running silhouettes, the Off-White Blazer Low fuses an Air Terra Humara TPU heel piece with a classic vulcanized sole for a unique base. On the black leather upper, punched-out holes are scattered, similar to the Air Jordan 5 Off-White. An accented Electro Green over-lacing system, exposed foam tongue, zip tie tag, and Swoosh tab all add Off-White's signature detailing to complete the design.

The Nike Blazer Low Off-White Black Electro Green released in April of 2022 and retailed for $140.

name: Nike Blazer Low Devin Booker Chevrolet  Surf Blue
Nike Blazer Low sacai White Patent Leather

details.description:
The Nike Blazer Low sacai White Patent Leather refreshes sacai's signature Blazer Low with a glossy white patent leather construction. Doubled tongues, eyestays, and laces emphasize sacai's focus on reconstruction and abstract design. Finally, a stacked midsole provides an avant garde flair.

The Nike Blazer Low sacai White Patent Leather released in April of 2022 and retailed for $120.

name: Nike Blazer Low 77 Black White

details.description:
The Nike Blazer Low 77 Black White offers a timeless color two-tone combination in a low-top silhouette, combining smooth and rough textures with a pop of color.

The Black White Nike Blazer Low 77 upper features pristine black leather with a classic white Swoosh, complemented by durable black suede overlays at the toe and the sides. This design showcases details like an exposed-foam tongue and a slightly off-white midsole transitioning to a herringbone-patterned rubber outsole. Additional branding elements include the NIKE wordmark on the heel tab and the orange Swoosh and NIKE wordmark on the woven togue tag.

The standout feature of the Nike Blazer Low 77 Black White is its captivating retro design, characterized by branding elements adorned with both vintage and updated insignias. This combination pays homage to the classic Blazer silhouette while infusing a contemporary twist. The sneaker debuted for $85 on December 4th, 2020.

name: Nike Blazer Low Platform Pink Glaze (Women's)

details.description: The Nike Blazer Low Platform Pink Glaze W is a stylish and comfortable sneaker that is perfect for everyday wear. The shoe features a low-cut design with a platform sole that provides added height and support. The upper is made from premium leather and features a soft pink glaze colorway that is both eye-catching and versatile. The shoe also features a padded collar and tongue for added comfort, as well as a durable rubber outsole for traction and durability. The Nike Blazer Low Platform Pink Glaze W was released on April 27th, 2022, and retails for $95. Overall, this sneaker is a great choice for anyone looking for a comfortable and stylish shoe that can be worn in a variety of settings.

name: Nike Blazer Low sacai KAWS Purple Dusk

details.description:
The Nike Blazer Low sacai KAWS Dusk is constructed of smooth purple leather with multicolored overlapping eyestays and Swooshes, drawing inspiration from the palettes prevalent in KAWS' most renowned pieces of art. KAWS XX insignias are debossed on the lateral toe. From there, doubled tongues, soles, and laces complete the design.

The Nike Blazer Low sacai KAWS Dusk releases in December of 2021 and retailed for $140.

name: Nike Blazer Low sacai KAWS Neptune Blue

details.description:
The Nike Blazer Low sacai KAWS Neptune Blue features a Neptune Blue leather upper with multicolored overlapping eyestays and Swooshes, drawing inspiration from the palettes prevalent in KAWS' most renowned pieces of art. On the stacked outsole, KAWS XX insignias are debossed on the lateral toe. Doubled tongues and laces add the finishing touch.

The Nike Blazer Low sacai KAWS Neptune Blue releases in November of 2021 and retailed for $140.

name: Nike Blazer Low Platform White Black (Women's)

details.description:
The Nike Blazer Low Platform White Black W is a basketball shoe designed by Bill Bowerman, co-founder of Nike.

The Nike Blazer Low Platform for women has a white leather upper festooned by a conspicuous black Swoosh with tonal suede overlay accents at the shoe lateral forefoot and toe. The sneaker also has an exposed foam tongue. The shoe sits on double-tape detailing platform midsoles, while underfoot are herringbone-tread rubber outsoles for extra grip.

The Nike Blazer Low Platform White Black W shoe was first released in July 2021 with a retail price set at $95.

name: Nike Blazer Low sacai KAWS Red

details.description:
The Nike Blazer Low sacai KAWS Red is composed of a red leather upper with multicolored overlapping eyestays and Swooshes, drawing inspiration from the palettes prevalent in KAWS' most renowned pieces of art. On the stacked outsole, KAWS XX insignias are debossed on the lateral toe. Doubled tongues with co-branded woven labels complete the design.

The Nike Blazer Low sacai KAWS Red releases in November of 2021 and retailed for $140.

name: Nike Blazer Low sacai British Tan

details.description:
The Nike Blazer Low sacai British Tan features a British Tan suede and leather upper with bold red accents. Much like previous designs in the Nike x sacai catalog, doubled Swooshes, overlays, tongues, and soles honor sacai's reconstructive design aesthetic.

The Nike Blazer Low sacai British Tan released in August of 2021 and retailed for $120.

name: Nike Blazer Low Acronym Black Olive Aura

details.description:
The Nike Blazer Low ACRONYMⓇ Black Olive Aura features a black ballistic nylon upper with geometric laser-cut detailing revealing light grey fabrication. At the heel, removable TPU units that could be likened to futuristic armor add mechanical qualities. From there, an ACRONYMⓇ branded tongue with exposed foam edges completes the design.

The Nike Blazer Low ACRONYMⓇ Black Olive Aura released in February of 2022 and retailed for $140.

name: Nike Blazer Low sacai White Magma Orange

details.description:
The Nike Blazer Low sacai White Magma Orange arrives in a white leather upper with Magma Orange and yellow overlays. A duplicated tongue and overlapped white sole that stacks around the heel finishes off the design.

The Nike Blazer Low sacai White Magma Orange released in June of 2021 and retailed for $120.

name: Nike Blazer Low sacai Medium Grey Classic Green

details.description:
The Nike Blazer Low sacai Medium Grey Classic Green features a Medium Grey leather upper with Classic Green, turquoise, and white overlays. The design is completed by a doubled tongue and stacked white sole that gathers around the heel.

The Nike Blazer Low sacai Medium Grey Classic Green released in June of 2021 and retailed for $120.

name: Nike Blazer Low Platform Triple White (Women's)

details.description:
The Nike Blazer Low Platform Triple White (W) was released as one of the many reimaginations of the 1972 Blazer basketball shoe. It comes in the classic low-profile court style in women’s sizing.

This white women’s Nike Blazer Low Platform Triple is constructed with a crisp leather upper that combines soft suede layers and American West-inspired chain stitch details. These simple lines, low-cut style, and a padded collar for comfort give the sneaker a sleek look. The vulcanized midsole and solid-rubber outsole with herringbone pattern add to the durability of the shoe, increase traction, and provide a heritage styling. The elevated outsole and midsole with double-taped detailing offer a lifted stance, adding to the boldness of the sneaker.

What our experts say makes this shoe stand out is the raised midsole and outsole that give off a confident and bold look. The women’s Nike Blazer Low Platform Triple White (W) was released on June 3rd, 2021. Upon its debut, its retail price was set at $95.

name: Nike Blazer Low 77 Jumbo White Photon Dust Light Smoke Grey University Red
